Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fastener hole elongation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 05/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
